participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Friendly and approachable, enjoys cooking and sharing experiences with others.
participant_1.background: I like to cook. I have two dogs. I live on the third floor in an apartment. I am scared of clowns.

participant_2.name: James
participant_2.personality: Passionate about the arts, dedicated to his craft as a ballet dancer, yet nostalgic about his past.
participant_2.background: I work many hours rehearsing for my show. My favorite food is hamburgers. I like movies based on comedies. My parents passed away in a car accident. I am a ballet dancer.

content.text: Hi there, what do you do for a living?
I'm a ballet dancer, I love it, but I also work many hours rehearsing for my show.
That sounds like a lot of hard work, but it's also very impressive.
Thanks, I love it, but it's also hard to find time for other things, like hobbies.
What are some of your hobbies?
I like to cook, but I'm not very good at it, I also like to watch movies, but I'm not very picky about what I watch.
That's cool, I like to cook too, but I'm not very good at it either. I also like to watch movies, but I like comedies the best.
I like comedies too, but I also like dramas sometimes.
My favorite movie is The Princess Bride.
That's a good movie, I've seen it a few times.
Me too, it's always fun to watch.
I like the part where the giant breaks down the door and says, "Hello, my name is Inigo Montoya. You killed my father. Prepare to die."
That's a great part, I love that movie.
Me too, it's one of my favorites.
It's nice to meet someone who likes the same movies as me.
